teReo: He aha te mea nui o te ao? He tangata, he tangata, he tangata.
english: What is the greatest thing in the world? It is people, it is people, it is people.
blankedText: He aha te mea nui o te ao? He ___, he tangata, he tangata.

english: A canoe we are all in together — we are all in this together.

teReo: Mā te huruhuru ka rere te manu.
english: With feathers a bird can fly — by investing in people they can succeed.
blankedText: Mā te huruhuru ka rere te ___.

teReo: Kia hora te marino, kia whakapapa pounamu te moana, kia tere te kārohirohi i mua i tō huarahi. Aroha atu, aroha mai.
english: May calm spread, may the sea be like greenstone, may the shimmer of light guide your way. Give love, receive love.
blankedText: Kia hora te marino, kia whakapapa pounamu te moana, kia tere te kārohirohi i mua i tō huarahi. ___ atu, aroha mai.

teReo: Whatungarongaro te tangata, toitū te whenua.
english: People pass on, but the land remains.

teReo: He kōrero purakau, he kōrero wairua.
english: A story told is a spirit shared.

teReo: E kore e mimiti te puna wai o Waihī.
english: The spring of Waihī will never run dry.
blankedText: E kore e mimiti te puna ___ o Waihī.

teReo: He moana pukepuke e ekengia e te waka.
english: A choppy sea can be navigated by canoe — challenges can be overcome.
blankedText: He ___ pukepuke e ekengia e te waka.

teReo: E kore te rākau e tū ki te kore he pakiaka.
english: A tree cannot stand without roots.
blankedText: E kore te ___ e tū ki te kore he pakiaka.

english: There is food at the end of my hands — I am self-sufficient.

teReo: Whāia te iti kahurangi; ki te tūohu koe, me he maunga teitei.
english: Seek the treasure you value most; if you bow your head, let it be to a lofty mountain.
blankedText: Whāia te iti kahurangi; ki te tūohu koe, me he ___ teitei.

teReo: Ehara taku toa i te toa takitahi, engari he toa takitini.
english: My strength is not mine alone, but the strength of many — it takes a village.
blankedText: Ehara taku toa i te toa takitahi, engari he toa takitini.

teReo: E rere ana te awa, e kore e hoki mai.
english: The river flows on and never returns — time does not come back.
blankedText: E rere ana te ___, e kore e hoki mai.

teReo: Āpiti hono, tātai hono, ka rere te karanga a te rā.
english: Join together, weave together, the call of the day rings out.
blankedText: Āpiti hono, tātai hono, ka rere te karanga a te ___.
